data.name: applicationFailedToLoadWithMessageError
data.value: Application failed to load. Id: "{0}". Error: {1}
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPApplicationBase] {Locked}An error to show when the application fails to load in the page start. It includes the error message. {0} is the application id, {1} is the original error.

data.name: applicationFailedToInitializeError
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPApplicationBase] {Locked}An error to show when the applicaiton fails to initialize. The {0} placeholder is the error.

data.name: clickToResolveIssueLinkText
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPApplicationBase] Link to show end user when they must be redirected to Azure AD to provide credentials.
